Text: Voted down for lazy re-posting of someone else's torrent
Bitdefender didn't like the screenshot. Possibly infected, so don't klick!!

bernt84 is right about ONE thing: Don't click the link. It's gone and redirected to an ad for web-hosting. No viruses, just doesn't exist.

If he had used an anti-virus that actually gives you ANY control, he could have given the same information instead of an assumption based on bad data.
